text: The East Turkestan Islamic Movement (ETIM, also known as the Turkistan Islamic Party, Turkistan Islamic Movement, and other names); is a Waziri based mujahideen organization. Its stated goals are the independence of East Turkestan. ETIM has reportedly committed over 200 acts of terrorism between 1990 and 2001, resulting in at least 162 deaths and over 440 injuries. ==References== Category:Nationalist organizations in Asia Category:Terrorism Category:Rebel militia groups in Asia Category:Politics of China Category:Politics of Pakistan
title: Turkistan Islamic Party
